ygData.subject: ack!
ygData.msgSnippet: well, just try very hard to keep the not nodrop thing a secret among only SK players.. that should spare us for a while. and luckily, because the quest giving
ygData.messageBody:
well, just try very hard to keep the not nodrop thing a secret among only SK
players.. that should spare us for a while. and luckily, because the quest
giving npcs are cloistered away in rather hard to reach locations, simply
harvesting them is somewhat impractical. the only parts i can only really
see being harvested are the bp and vambraces.. the rest are just not worth
the effort for somebody other than an sk.

bracers: gotta kill mino hero. not worth the effort, when you can use those
shackles to get a hero bracer.

helm: need to kill lots of FP militia helms. not a problem for some, but
others will not want to go KoS in a major city just so they can sell helms
to the smallest sector of society.

gauntlet, greaves, and boots: you have to clear out half of najena every
time you get one of these. more work than most people want to do for
mid-level class specific items.

in short, few people other than SK are going to want to do this quest in the
first place.

and yes, i heard about the monkies. sat there with another sk and some other
folks for about 4 hours, and between the two of us we picked up 11 pieces we
didnt already have, and numerous repeats. (i'm now only short the decayed
helm). am i a bastard for exploiting this? yes. but anything that gets me
out of that gods forsaken hole known as cazic faster.. it wasnt a totally
selfish affair tho, there were numerous lvl 30ish in the group, so i
introduced them to the xp money train. got at least two of them over a
bubble and a half of xp in that timeframe. sadly we got trained out by
somebody before many tae ew lizards spawned, but we had both the upper and
lower TR locked down with our lone group, and we didnt even have a dedicated
healer. it was pretty fun :)

by the way, wearing a full suit of darkforge minus the helm (hatless
actually) looks pretty damn cool ;p

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
